ABTS test is also a spectrophotometric method which is carried out using an improved ABTS decolourisation assay
18 . It is applicable for both lipophilic and hydrophilic compounds. ABTS + was generated by oxidation of ABTS with potassium persulfate
18 . Three milliliter of ABTS cation solution were added to 30 mL methanol extract solution in 1 cm path length disposable micro cuvette and the decrease of absorption was measured during 6 min
18 .
